meanings.definition: A method of printing in which ink is transferred to paper using a raised surface.
meanings.sent1: The letterpress created beautiful invitations for the wedding.
meanings.sent2: The old printing shop still uses a traditional letterpress for their work.
meanings.sent3: The letterpress decided to take a break and relax on the shelf.
meanings.sent4: Her words left a letterpress on his heart, forever imprinted.
meanings.sent5: The letterpress hummed as it worked, leaving a lasting mark on the paper.
